author: Resurgam
title: Need a Pen?  How About a SpongePen?
review:
Well this is the first Lego pen I bought, and I have to admit, it's pretty cool!  The design was well-thought-out and it's easy to write with!

Pros:
* Good design
* Easy to write with
* Cool jellyfish figure

Cons:
* So cool you don't want to write with it and ruin it!

This is a cool idea!  I hope they make "Indiana Jones" pens in the future, too!
